0.name: Stand Collar Short Down Jacket
0.description: The Stand Collar Short Down Jacket is a hip length winter down coat, designed for protection and warmth combined with ease of movement.

1.name: Down jacket with high collar
1.description: Long, superlight down jacket with a semi-opaque look. The post-consumer recycled polyester fabric brings together the fluid, soft-to-the-touch feel with a compact structure.

2.name: Turtleneck with long sleeves
2.description: Ideal for the hot season, when the heat and humidity do not give respite.

3.name: Long sweater
3.description: When it is getting colder outside, you are going to love being able to wear a cardigan like this one.

4.name: Shopper tote bag
4.description: Our wide shopper is a tote bag in a classic aesthetic design. With its large size, the bag fits all of your belongings easily.

5.name: Compact purse with shoulder strap
5.description: This purse is the perfect size to carry your cell phone and a few essentials.
